Title: Overview: Calculate Property Match Score
Description: Currently shows hardcoded match score (92). Need to implement calculation based on property data completeness, financial metrics alignment, and market benchmarks.
Requirements:
* Calculate from property data completeness score
* Include financial metrics alignment
* Factor in market benchmarks
* Update in real-time when data changes
Acceptance Criteria: * Match score displays correctly\n* Updates automatically when property data changes\n* Score reflects actual data quality

Title: Overview: Calculate Property IQ Score
Description: Currently shows hardcoded IQ score (92). Need to implement intelligent scoring algorithm based on data quality, performance metrics, and risk factors.
Requirements:
* Implement scoring algorithm
* Factor in data quality metrics
* Include performance indicators
* Consider risk factors
Acceptance Criteria: * IQ score is accurate\n* Algorithm is well-documented\n* Score updates with data changes
